data.title: 4 Good Reasons to Avoid Twitter Stock After Disappointing Earnings
data.text: Twitter's earnings were not good. They were so bad that investors should avoid TWTR stock for now.

data.title: Social media firms have 'questions to answer' over disinformation
data.text: MPs have accused Twitter, Facebook and Google of being "unwilling" to give clear answers on how they are tackling false information during the pandemic.
